SA11sanss15u:5_0: iha gṛhapate gṛhī bodhisatvo dharmeṇa bhogān paryeṣate nâdharmeṇa /
SA11sanss15u:9_0: na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvêryāpatham āracayati /
SA11sanss15u:11_0: na śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ kramān utkṣipati na nikṣipati yugamātraprekṣikayā saviśva-
SA11sanss15u:16_0: na bodhisatvo lābhahetor lābhanidānaṃ mandabhāṇī mṛdubhāṇī na priyabhāṇī bhavati /
SA11sanss15u:19_0: bodhisatvo dāyakena dānapatinā vā lābhena pravāryamāṇo vā câlpêcchatāṃ darśayati /
SA11sanss15u:21_0: antardāhâiṣa kulaputra yad vācâlpêcchatā cittena lābhakāmatā /
SA11sanss15u:22_0: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kuhanalapanalābhâpagato bhavati /
SA11sanss15u:24_0: na bodhisatvo dānapatiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ karoti /
SA11sanss15u:28_0: na ca taṃ dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ vā kiṃcit prārthayate /
SA11sanss15u:31_0: yāvan na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvâivaṃ vācaṃ niścārayati /
SA11sanss15u:34_0: kena vā me dānapatinâmukaṃ vastu pratipāditaṃ tasya ca mayâmukôpakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA11sanss15u:35_0: tena me śīlavān ayam iti kṛtvêdaṃ cêdaṃ ca dattaṃ bahuśrutêti /
SA11sanss15u:37_0: mayā ca tasya kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya parigṛhītaṃ /
SA11sanss15u:39_0: tatra kāyakṣatir yad uta lābhahetor lābhanidānam ādhāvanaparidhāvanaṃ dauḥśīlyasamudācaraṇaṃ ca /
SA11sanss15u:45_0: iha bodhisatvo na tulākūṭena na mānakūṭena na visraṃbhaghātikayā na dhūrtatayā lābham upārjayati /
SA11sanss15u:48_0: ye te lābhā staupikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā dhārmikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā sāṃghikasaṃsṛṣṭā vâdattā vânanujñātā vā /
SA11sanss15u:55_0: mātāpitṛmitrâmātyajñātisālohitebhyaḥ kālânukālam ātmanā paribhuṅkte paribhuñjānaś câraktaḥ paribhuṅkte /
SA11sanss15u:56_0: svanadhyavasito na câlabhyamāne lābhe khedacittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss15u:57_0: na paritapyati na ca dāyakadānapatīnām antike 'prasādacittam utpādayatîty ādi //
SA11sanss15u:58_0: tatrâiṣâpy asya bodhisatvasya bhogaśuddhir ātmabhāvaśuddhivat parahitāya bhavet //
SA11sanss15u:60_0: punar aparaṃ bhadanta śāriputra ye praviśantîdaṃ gṛhaṃ teṣāṃ samanantarapraviṣṭānāṃ sarvakleśā na bādhante 'yaṃ dvitīyâścaryâdbhuto dharmaḥ /
SA11sanss15u:62_0: atha tato bhojanāt sarvāvatī sā parṣat tṛptā bhūtā /
SA11sanss15u:64_0: yaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālais tad anyaiś ca satvais tad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ tā-
SA11sanss15u:69_0: sarvaromakūpebhyaś ca teṣāṃ tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
SA11sanss15u:70_0: tad yathâpi nāma tasyām eva sarvagandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau vṛkṣāṇāṃ gandhaḥ //
SA11sanss15u:72_0: yaiś ca bhadantânanda bhikṣubhir anavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām evâvakrāntaniyamānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
SA11sanss15u:74_0: yair anutpāditabodhicittaiḥ satvaiḥ paribhuktaṃ teṣām utpāditabodhicittānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
SA11sanss15u:75_0: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nâpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyatîti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanss15u:85_0: yathā gaganaṃ samaviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti //
SA11sanss15u:87_0: yathā gaganam aparyantam evam aparyantīkṛtena cittena tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:88_0: yathā gaganaṃ vistīrṇam anāvaraṇam evaṃ bodhipariṇāmitaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:89_0: yathā gaganam arūpi evaṃ sarvarūpâniśritaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:92_0: evam asaṃjñi asaṃskṛtam avijñaptilakṣaṇam evam apratijñānaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:93_0: yathā gaganaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetraspharaṇam evaṃ sarvasatvamaitrīspharaṇaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:95_0: yathā gaganaṃ sadāprakāśam evaṃ cittaprakṛtiviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dada-ti /
SA11sanss15u:96_0: yathā gaganaṃ sarvasatvâvakāśaṃ evaṃ sarvasatvôpajīvyaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:97_0: yāvad yathā nirmito nirmitāya dadāti nirvikalpo 'nābhogaḥ /
SA11sanss15u:106_0: evaṃ tyāgacittaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvo gaganasamadāno bhavati //
SA11sanss15u:112_0: nâsti nikrandadānaṃ yāvan nâsti yācanakeṣûpataptadānaṃ nâsty uccagghana*ullāpanadānaṃ nâsti parāṅmukhadānaṃ nâsty apaviddhadānaṃ nâsty asvahastadānaṃ /
SA11sanss15u:115_0: nâsty akāladānaṃ nâsti viṣaśastradānaṃ nâsti satvaviheṭhanādānam iti //
SA11sanss15u:120_0: madyapānād api nairāśyakṛte bodhisatve pratigho garīyān /
SA11sanss15u:121_0: satvasaṃgrahahāniś câto 'nyaprasādanôpāyâsaṃbhave madyaṃ deyam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanss15u:122_0: śastrâdiṣv api yady anubadhagurulâdyavavicārād dānam āpadyeta /
SA11sanss15u:130_0: śuddhaṃ gaganaṃ śuddhaṃ tacchīlaṃ /vimalaṃ gaganaṃ vimalaṃ tacchīlaṃ /
SA11sanss15u:134_0: yāvad achedyâbhedyaṃ gaganam achedyâbhedyaṃ tacchīlam ity ādi //
SA11sanss15u:136_0: samaprayogaṃ gaganaṃ sarvasatvasamacittasya kṣāntipariśuddhir ity ādi //
SA11sanss15u:144_0: na kalpo na vikalpo na parikalpaḥ //
SA11sanss15u:145_0: yâivaṃ kṣāntir iyaṃ bodhisatvasya paramā gaganasamā kṣāntir /
SA11sanss15u:177_0: yāvad iyaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitā caryāpariśuddhir iti //
SA11sanss15u:180_1: saddharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca bodhisatvacaryâtyajanagocaraś câyam api bodhisatvasya gocara /
